name: The Hunt (itch) (SFBdragon)
description:
This is a 2d, bird's eye, rpg-ish game.

You play as a present, awoken trapped in a house, searching for their young. You wouldn't want to get caught by any humans though.

Controls:

WASD - move around

Space - interact with what is directly infront of you

Escape - Exit

Warning: this game does not save progress, but it is short, so no worries.

I do plan on creating OSX and GNU/Linux versions soon, but for now it's only Windows.

Enjoy!

Credits:

-Shaun B

-Michael D

-internet
